long_description: What hidden treasures await your budding naturalist in. Author: Donald M. Silver with illustrations by Patricia J. Wynne. Softcover; 47 pages; color photographs and maps. McGraw Hill; copyright 1995. Includes full-color illustrations of the woods and its creatures, activities with clear instructions, a picture field guide and an easy-to-use glossary.
short_description: What hidden treasures await your budding naturalist in One Small Square of your local woods? Discover natural wonders with the educational help of this beautifully illustrated book.
